schedule.prompt: Extract the insurance amount for the Life Insurance Benefit. Return the response in this format: Flat $[amount] (e.g., Flat $20,000) or $[multiplier] of Annual Salary  $[maximum amount]

reduction.prompt: Extract the age-based reduction clause for the Life Insurance Benefit. Return it in this format: Reduces by [percentage]% at age [age], further reduces to [amount] or [percentage]% at [age]
examples: Reduces by 50% at age 65, further reduces to $10,000 at age 70

non_evidence_maximum.prompt: Extract the insurance amount that does not require medical evidence for the Life Insurance Benefit. If not explicitly stated, find the insurance amount for the Life Insurance Benefit. Return it as a dollar value in this format: $[amount]

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which Life Insurance coverage terminates. Return it in this format: [age] or format it based on the examples

schedule.prompt: Find the amount of insurance for dependent life insurance. Look for specific amounts for spouse and children.

termination_age.prompt: Find the age at which dependent life insurance coverage terminates.

schedule.prompt: Extract the insurance amount for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return the response in this format: %[percentage] of monthly earnings or $[amount]

monthly_maximum.prompt: Extract the maximum monthly benefit amount for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount]"

tax_status.prompt: Extract the tax status of the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[tax status]"

elimination_period.prompt: Extract the elimination period before benefits begin for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] days"

benefit_period.prompt: Extract the maximum period for which benefits will be paid for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "to age [age]"
examples: 2 years own occupation, to age 65 any occupation

definition.prompt: Extract the definition of disability in terms of duration and occupation type for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[duration] ([duration in months]) [occupation type]"

offsets.prompt: Extract the income/benefit offsets that reduce LTD benefit. Return it in this format: "[offsets]"

cost_of_living_adjustment.prompt: Extract the cost of living adjustment clause for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]%" or "Consumer Price Index or [percentage]%, whichever is less"
examples: Consumer Price Index or 2%, whichever is less

pre_existing.prompt: Extract the pre-existing condition/limitation for the long term disability benefit. Look for text about any pre-existing condition exclusions. Format the response as in the examples.
examples: 13 weeks if treatment free; otherwise 12 months

survivor_benefit.prompt: Extract the survivor benefit details for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] months" or "[number] year"

non_evidence_maximum.prompt: Extract the maximum amount that does not require evidence for the Long Term Disability Benefit. If not explicitly stated, return the schedule amount listed under the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount]"

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which coverage terminates for the Long Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[age]"

schedule.prompt: Extract the schedule of benefits for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% of weekly earnings"
examples: 70% of weekly salary to a maximum of $1,500

weekly_maximum.prompt: Extract the maximum weekly benefit amount for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount]"

tax_status.prompt: Extract the tax status of the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[tax status]"

elimination_period.prompt: Extract the elimination period before benefits begin for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number]st day accident & hospital; [number]th day sickness"

benefit_period.prompt: Extract the maximum period for which benefits will be paid for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] weeks"

non_evidence_maximum.prompt: Extract the maximum amount without evidence for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount]"

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which coverage terminates for the Short Term Disability Benefit. Return it in this format: "[age]"

schedule.prompt: Extract the insurance amount for the Critical Illness Benefit. Return the response in this format: Flat $[amount] (e.g., Flat $20,000) or $[multiplier] of Annual Salary to $[maximum amount]

impairments.prompt: Extract the covered impairments/conditions for the Critical Illness Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] illnesses included: [illness]"
examples: 25 covered conditions including Cancer, Heart Attack, Stroke

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which Critical Illness coverage terminates. Return it in this format: "[age]"

prescription_drugs.prompt: Extract the prescription drug coverage details for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[coverage percentage]% - [deductible details]"
examples: 100% - Equal to dispensing fee deductible per prescription
90% - Nil deductible - Drugs purchased at Costco

pay_direct_drug_card.prompt: Extract the pay direct drug card availability for the Health Care Benefit. Format the response as in the examples.

maximum.prompt: Extract the overall maximum coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] or Unlimited"

fertility_drugs.prompt: Extract the fertility drug coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] lifetime maximum" or "[number] cycles to $[amount] lifetime maximum"

smoking_cessations.prompt: Extract the smoking cessation coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] lifetime maximum" or "Not included"

vaccines.prompt: Extract the vaccine coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[vaccine coverage]"

major_medical.prompt: Extract the major medical coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]%"

annual_deductible.prompt: Extract the annual deductible amount for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount]"

hospitalization.prompt: Extract the hospitalization coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% - [deductible details] - [room type]"

orthotic_shoes.prompt: Extract the orthotic shoes coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per benefit year maximum"

orthotic_inserts.prompt: Extract the orthotic inserts coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per benefit year maximum" or "$[amount] every [number] years"

hearing_aids.prompt: Extract the hearing aids coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] every [number] years"

vision_care.prompt: Extract the vision care coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per benefit year maximum"

eye_exams.prompt: Extract the eye exams coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per benefit year maximum"

paramedical_practitioners.prompt: Extract the paramedical practitioners coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% - $[amount] per practitioner per benefit year maximum"
examples: 100% - $500 per practitioner per benefit year maximum

included_specialists.prompt: Extract the list of covered specialists for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[specialist1], [specialist2], [specialist3]"

out_of_country.prompt: Extract the out of country coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% - [deductible details] - $[amount] lifetime maximum"

maximum_duration.prompt: Extract the maximum duration of coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] days" or "[number] months"

trip_cancellation.prompt: Extract the trip cancellation coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per trip"

private_duty_nursing.prompt: Extract the private duty nursing coverage for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per benefit year maximum"

survivor_benefit.prompt: Extract the survivor benefit duration for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] months"

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which coverage terminates for the Health Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[age]"

annual_deductible.prompt: Extract the annual deductible amount for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] Single; $[amount] Family" or "None"

basic_and_preventative.prompt: Extract the basic & preventative services coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% up to $[amount] per year"

periodontic_and_endodontic.prompt: Extract the periodontic & endodontic coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% up to $[amount] per year"

annual_maximum.prompt: Extract the annual maximum coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] per year"

major_restorative_services.prompt: Extract the major restorative services coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% up to $[amount] per year"

orthodontic_services.prompt: Extract the orthodontic services coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% up to $[amount] lifetime maximum"

lifetime_maximum.prompt: Extract the lifetime maximum coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "$[amount] lifetime maximum"

recall_frequency.prompt: Extract the recall examination frequency for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "Every [number] months"

scaling_and_rooting_units.prompt: Extract the scaling and root planing units coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] units per year"

white_filings.prompt: Extract the white fillings coverage for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[percentage]% to [tooth/teeth] or [surface]"
examples: 100% to premolars and anterior teeth only

fee_guide.prompt: Extract the dental fee guide used for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[province] [year] fee guide"

survivor_benefit.prompt: Extract the survivor benefit duration for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[number] months"

termination_age.prompt: Extract the age at which coverage terminates for the Dental Care Benefit. Return it in this format: "[age]"
